Agra.title: Agra
Agra.byline: Agra (Hindi: आगरा Āgrā) is the city of the Taj Mahal, in the north Indian state of Uttar Pradesh, some 200 km from Delhi.

Agrigento.title: Agrigento
Agrigento.byline: Agrigento (Sicilian: Girgenti or Giurgenti) is the capital of the eponymous province on the Italian island of Sicily.

Agria.title: Agria
Agria.byline: Agria is east of Volos, separated from Volos by Goritza hill.
